title: WWE 2K15
description: The Games on Demand version supports English, French, Italian, German, Spanish. WWE 2K15 ushers in a new era of WWE video games!  The first wrestling game to be featured on Next-Gen platforms, WWE 2K15 will introduce the most authentic WWE gameplay to date, closer than ever to what fans see on WWE TV.  With a host of gameplay advancements and to-be-announced features, WWE 2K15 will bring the atmosphere of WWE to your home!  For the first time ever, play as the iconic Sting, this year’s pre-order launch exclusive!  Feel every blow, hear every impact.  WWE 2K15. Feel It.

contentRating.label: T (Teen)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

childDownloads.title: WWE 2K15 Showcase Season Pass
childDownloads.description: Save over 20% on three 2K Showcase Add-On Packs and receive the Exclusive Character Paige! 2K Showcase lets you relive groundbreaking rivalries and matches in this all-new single player campaign!  All 2K Showcase Season Pass content will be available by April 2015.  Does not include all WWE 2K15 packs. All Showcase content featured in the Season Pass will be available for individual purchase on Xbox Games Store.   If you purchase this WWE 2K15 Showcase Season Pass, all future content that is part of this pass will be accessible in-game once it is available and SHOULD NOT BE DOWNLOADED from Xbox Games Store, or you will be charged twice.  WWE 2K15 game required; sold separately. Visit wwe.2k.com for more details.

childDownloads.title: Accelerator
childDownloads.description: If you own the WWE 2K15 Showcase Season Pass, DO NOT purchase this content here as you will be charged again. WWE 2K15 game required; sold separately. Xbox Live free membership required.  Decide the overall rankings and attributes levels of every WWE Superstar, Legend, and Diva in the game. Unlock every WWE Superstar, Legend, and Diva, including alternate attires and all arenas and championships in WWE 2K15.
